contactMeForm.title: Contact me
contactMeForm.info: To get in touch, please fill out the form with your full name, email, and message. Ensure you provide a valid email address to receive a prompt response

fullNameField.label: Full Name*
fullNameField.placeholder: Insert your name Ex: John Miller

contactMeForm.agreeToTermsField: I agree to provide my name and email address to be contacted. (By checking this box, you agree to share your name and email address only for the purpose of being contacted. Your information will not be stored, shared, or used for any other purposes).

bioSections.contentParagraph: My passion for computer science and development found solid roots during my educational years, starting with my studies at the P.E. Imbriani State High School in Avellino, Italy, where I graduated in July 2018. Opting for Applied Sciences was a pivotal decision, as it allowed me to deeply explore mathematics, physics, and biology—subjects that honed my analytical thinking and problem-solving abilities. This preparation laid the groundwork for my subsequent university experience at the University of Salerno in Fisciano, where I earned a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science in December 2022. During my university journey, I had the opportunity to fully immerse myself in the field of computer science, tackling in-depth studies on programming, algorithms, operating systems, and artificial intelligence. These studies not only reinforced my passion but also broadened my perspective on the capabilities of software development and how technology can be used to improve everyday life. The combination of theory and practice, through projects and laboratories, was crucial in developing my technical skills and the ability to practically apply the knowledge acquired. Choosing to pursue this career was a natural evolution of my interest and curiosity towards the digital world, pushing me to continuously explore and innovate in this dynamic and ever-evolving field.
bioSections.imageDescription: During the exposition of my graduation thesis (December 15, 2023)

bioSections.contentParagraph: My professional journey in computer science began with an internship at SI2001 in Battipaglia, Campania, which lasted from November 2022 to February 2023. During this period, I acquired skills in developing distributed applications, mastering both back-end and front-end technologies. This experience allowed me to utilize modern and highly demanded technologies in the market, refining my technical abilities in a stimulating and dynamic environment. Upon completing my internship, I was hired as a Full-Stack Developer by the same company in March 2023, a role I continue to hold today. Transitioning from an intern to a full member of the development team gave me the opportunity to further deepen my knowledge and technical skills, working on more complex and challenging projects. Although the role of a full-stack developer requires good versatility across different technologies and frameworks, my passion and main goal remain focused on front-end development. I am continually seeking opportunities to excel in this area, convinced that the user interface is not just a matter of aesthetics but a crucial point of contact that defines the end-user experience. My aspiration is to become a reference point in the field of front-end, bringing continuous innovation and improvements to the projects I work on. In this journey, my passion for computer science continues to guide me towards new challenges and achievements, with the goal of excelling in every aspect of my work while maintaining a clear focus on the specialization that most excites me.

skillsPage.callToActionSecondHeading: Discover my top skills and how I can add value to your team

skillsSections.contentParagraph: Frontend development is my main area of expertise and passion. I have a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, which I have been able to refine and expand through my academic studies and professional experience. I am proficient in using modern frameworks and libraries such as React, Angular, and Vue.js, which I have used in various projects to create dynamic and responsive user interfaces. My experience in frontend development has allowed me to work on a wide range of projects, from simple websites to complex web applications, always focusing on creating a seamless and engaging user experience. I am constantly exploring new technologies and best practices in frontend development to stay up-to-date with the latest trends and innovations in the field.

While frontend development is my main focus, I also have experience in backend development, which allows me to work on full-stack projects and have a comprehensive understanding of the development process. I have experience in developing RESTful APIs, working with databases, and deploying applications to cloud platforms. I am proficient in using Node.js and Express to create server-side applications and have experience with relational and non-relational databases such as MySQL and MongoDB. My experience in backend development complements my frontend skills and allows me to work on a wide range of projects, from simple websites to complex web applications. I am always looking for opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills in backend development to become a more versatile and well-rounded developer.

In addition to my technical skills, I also have a passion for web design and user interface design. I believe that a well-designed user interface is essential for creating a positive user experience and engaging users with the content of a website or application. I have experience in using design tools such as Figma and Adobe XD to create wireframes and mockups for web projects, as well as implementing responsive design principles to ensure that websites look great on all devices. My experience in web design allows me to work closely with designers and other stakeholders to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces that meet the needs and expectations of users. I am always looking for opportunities to improve my design skills and learn new techniques to create innovative and engaging user interfaces.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: This policy describes how personal data of users interacting with the website Stefano Biddau (My Portfolio) is processed. Please read the following carefully.

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content: The data controller is Stefano Biddau, who can be contacted at the email address: biddau.stefano99@gmail.com.

dataCollected.title: Data Collected and Purpose of Processing
dataCollected.description: This website does not collect or store personal data of users. However, the use of the contact form involves the forwarding of information through the EmailJS service, necessary to enable communication between the user and the owner. The information collected through the form includes:
points: First and last name (if provided by the user);
dataCollected.note: This information is processed solely to respond to requests sent through the form and is not stored on the website.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.description: Information forwarding occurs via the EmailJS service, which acts as the data processor according to its Privacy Policy. You can view it at the following link:

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: The data provided through the contact form is not shared with third parties, except for the transfer necessary for sending emails via EmailJS.

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.description: Pursuant to Articles 15-22 of Regulation (EU) 2016/679 ("GDPR"), users have the right to:
rights: Object to processing or request its restriction.
userRights.note: To exercise these rights, users can contact the controller at the email address indicated above.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content: The processing of personal data provided through the contact form is based on the user's explicit consent, as provided by Art. 6, paragraph 1, letter a) of the GDPR.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.description: Access and use of the Stefano Biddau website (My Portfolio) are subject to acceptance of these Terms and Conditions. Users are invited to read them carefully before using the services offered.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.content: This website is exclusively for informational and promotional purposes. Through it, users can view information about the owner's professional background and send inquiries via a contact form.

userObligations.title: User Obligations
points: Use the contact form in a lawful, professional, and respectful manner;
Refrain from sending offensive, fraudulent, or irrelevant content;
userObligations.note: Any abuse will be reported to the competent authorities.

liabilityLimitations.title: Limitation of Liability
liabilityLimitations.description: The owner will not be held responsible for:
points: Damages resulting from improper or unlawful use of the site;

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on the site (including text, images, logos, and design) is protected by intellectual property laws, specifically Law no. 633/1941 (Copyright Law) and subsequent amendments. Any unauthorized reproduction, distribution, or use is prohibited.

legal.title: Applicable Laws and Jurisdiction
legal.description: These Terms and Conditions are governed by Italian law, in particular by:

modifications.title: Modifications to the Terms
modifications.content: The owner reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Any changes will be published on this page with the date of the update.
